# CRC4 Example
Consider 4 bit CRC, 5 bit generator polynomial (4th order).
Generator oplynomial x^4 + x + 1 = 10011
16 bit data pattern, 4 bit 0 padding

Organizing the parameters in the table.
Item | Description
-----|----------------------------
Generator<br/>Polynomial | 43210<br/>------<br/>10011
Data pattern<br/>and padding | 01101100 00001111 0000
<br/>


```
CRC Accumulator
            FEDCBA9876543210FEDCBA9876543210 Input           Padding 
Initial     00000000000000000000000000000000 01101100000011110000
                                       10011
IN0         00000000000000000000000000000000 1101100000011110000
                                       10011
IN1         00000000000000000000000000000001 101100000011110000
                                       10011
IN2         00000000000000000000000000000011 01100000011110000
                                       10011
IN3         00000000000000000000000000000110 1100000011110000
                                       10011
IN4         00000000000000000000000000001101 100000011110000
                                       10011
IN5         00000000000000000000000000011011 00000011110000
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001000 00000011110000
IN6         00000000000000000000000000010000 0000011110000
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000011 0000011110000
IN7         00000000000000000000000000000110 000011110000
                                       10011
IN8         00000000000000000000000000001100 00011110000
                                       10011
IN9         00000000000000000000000000011000 0011110000
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001011 0011110000
IN10        00000000000000000000000000010110 011110000
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000101 011110000
IN11        00000000000000000000000000001010 11110000
                                       10011
IN12        00000000000000000000000000010101 1110000
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000110 1110000
IN13        00000000000000000000000000001101 110000
                                       10011

                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001000 10000

                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000010 0000

                                       10011

                                       10011
IN18        00000000000000000000000000010000 0
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000011 0
IN19        00000000000000000000000000000110
Final remainder                         0110

Decoding
Initial     00000000000000000000000000000000 01101100000011110110
                                       10011
IN0         00000000000000000000000000000000 1101100000011110110
IN1         00000000000000000000000000000001 101100000011110110
IN2         00000000000000000000000000000011 01100000011110110
IN3         00000000000000000000000000000110 1100000011110110
IN4         00000000000000000000000000001101 100000011110110
IN5         00000000000000000000000000011011 00000011110110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001000 00000011110110
IN6         00000000000000000000000000010000 0000011110110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000011 0000011110110
IN7         00000000000000000000000000000110 000011110110
IN8         00000000000000000000000000001100 00011110110
IN9         00000000000000000000000000011000 0011110110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001011 0011110110
IN10        00000000000000000000000000010110 011110110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000101 011110110
IN11        00000000000000000000000000001010 11110110
IN12        00000000000000000000000000010101 1110110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000110 1110110
IN13        00000000000000000000000000001101 110110
IN14        00000000000000000000000000011011 10110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000001000 10110
IN15        00000000000000000000000000010001 0110
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000010 0110
IN16        00000000000000000000000000000100 110
IN17        00000000000000000000000000001001 10
IN18        00000000000000000000000000010011 0
                                       10011
  MSB match 00000000000000000000000000000000 0
IN19        00000000000000000000000000000000
Final remainder                         0000
```
Post padding bit count is equal to CRC size.
